title: Automaker Stocks Jump as U.S. Scraps Biden-Era Fuel Standards
description: European automaker shares rose sharply on Thursday after President Donald Trump moved to roll back U.S. fuel economy limits established under Joe Biden, according to Reuters. The administration framed the proposal as a way to lower consumer costs by making it…
